title: mdbf_sunum_fipar-c71001-09_0
text: TITLE OF PRESENTATION GENERAL INSTRUCTIONS A) PURPOSE The poster presentations serve two -fold purpose and allow the opportunity to present internships carried out by the students. The content of experience gained during the internship will be shared with other students, and faculty. B) FORMAT FOR POSTER (Dimensions of Panel to be provided to each student or group: Width=65cm; Height=176cm) ₃ TITLE OF PRESENTATION: Prepare a title banner for the poster including; (You can use Title Presentation Format Poster Presentation (Title Section) Template-2003.ppt) - PROJ 302 SUMMER INTERNSHIP - FACULTY: ENGINERING AND NATURAL SCIENCES (FENS) - PROGRAM: ……………………………………………. - NAME – SURNAME OF STUDENT: ………………… - COMPANY/ORGANIZATION NAME: ……………… - PERIOD OF INTERNSHIP: …………………………… ₃ SUMMARY: This section gives the focus of the internship and the short description of the project. ₃ COMPANY INFO ₃ FIGURES, TABLES, AND CHARTS WITH BRIEF TEXT EXPLANATIONS: Provide graph and text explanations of your internship. The poster should be legible from a specific distance These are general guidelines, not rules. Be creative and prepare your own poster. You may use Microsoft PowerPoint, Word, PhotoShop or any other graphical/text software. FIPAR-C71001-09 Table 1 Chart Company Information Figures Table 2
